Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body (joining 65742) of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is red and grey in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and perhaps very faint traces of a black-painted text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393750) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393750)
